notes.text: We've defined a new format for the page title displayed in the browser tab for OData V4 apps
We now consider filter and sort restrictions in table personalization in a containment scenario
Tree tables now support the copy and paste functionality
We've added the IsDeltaUpdate parameter in the ShareAction annotation batch to add further security measures to the collaborative draft feature
You can now include the AI icon for AI actions in both annotation-based buttons and extension buttons
You can now configure the semanticObject and readOnly properties in the manifest.json file for the Field building block
We've introduced the MessageButton building block
We've introduced a Page Building Block
Inline actions of FieldGroups from navigation properties now have the correct binding
Revert - We've defined a new format for the page title displayed in the browser tab for OData V4 apps"
We now add navigation parameters when a link is opened in a new tab using the table context menu
We've resolved an issue with setting a dynamic semantic object in the Field building block
We've resolved an issue where end users were unable to save an object correctly after enabling recommendations in sticky apps
We now show the strict handling dialog when an action returns a single warning message with a description or descriptionUrl
We now notify end users if the WebSocket connection is closed while requesting side effects
We now determine the visibility of a facet by the UI.Hidden annotation first, followed by whether all the facet's contents are hidden.
We've defined a new format for the page title displayed in the browser tab for OData V4 apps
We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
We now ensure that share links are correctly generated when adaptShareMetadata is overriden twice in a custom code
We've resolved an issue where the state of the flexible column layout wasn't stored correctly
We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
We've resolved an issue with setting a semantic object in the Field building block
We now ensure that messages are correctly handled when data is copied and pasted from external applications into tables
We've resolved an issue where the list report with a multi-input field displayed an error message when a draft was discarded in apps using the flexible column layout
We now ensure that side effects are executed correctly when a MultiValueField is changed in a table
We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page
